title: About Me
text:
I’m Karan, a Data Science master’s student based in Bristol.
I enjoy building tools that make life easier — from automation scripts to clean data workflows.



High‑impact AI domains (finance, medical imaging, automation)
Clean code and reproducible project structures
Making technical tools accessible to non‑technical users




I enjoy volleyball, exploring Bristol, and optimising my home tech setup.I’m always open to connecting with like‑minded people, so feel free to reach out!

title: Home
text:
I’m a Data Science master’s student at UWE Bristol, focused on building real-world, high‑impact AI and analytics projects.
I enjoy turning messy problems into clean, actionable solutions — whether it’s automation, modelling, or workflow optimisation.



Machine learning & data analysis

Python automation tools

Clean, reproducible workflows

Database design & ERD modelling

Technical documentation
